title: Enhancing Inclusivity in Online Learning Environments: Learner Diversity-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Course for university students from diverse backgrounds to understand inclusive design principles in online learning environments, with hands-on activities in digital device-provided settings

learning_goals: Learners can design three online learning activities that consider diverse learner characteristics (culture, experience, learning styles)
Learners can propose inclusive assessment methods using tools that analyze learner variables (Learner Diversity Navigator)
Learners can explain step-by-step an instructional design process that integrates learner diversity elements into the ADDIE model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
